body:
Heyo!
It's Sem here with a new topic. (Wich is kinda spammy ;-;)
So basically you can post here funny or weird screenshots you made in the past. It doesn't have to be Avicus related. It can be anything. Umm right now I'm using a laptop and I don't play MC on it. So I don't
have any screenshots.  :/ I'll post some screenshots tomorrow when I'm back again on my computer.
So post away guys! =]
